title: Bozi Taterevic (CREW CHIEF, MECHANIC, WRITER)
description:
Bozi Tatarevic has an amazing life, and life story. He is a crew chief, mechanic, dealer, tuner, flipper, fixer, racecraft specialist, and automotive twitter philosopher. He has written for Jalopnik, R&T, and Hagerty. And how he got there is amazing. 


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @hoonable
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @thebozi

 

WATCH the show: https://youtu.be/ruaOkiXzjpc

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
